name: Little Tikes Mini Golf
description:
Play the most epically fun mini golf game of all time!
Putt-putt your way through 9-holes of toy obstacles. Drive your golf ball past the Cozy Coupe, jump through the bounce house, circumvent the turtle sandbox sand traps and blast through the pirate ship cannon. Do you have the mad golf skills to get a birdie? An eagle? A hole-in-one?! Bask in the glory of your win in our awesome trophy room. Then play another round in our ever-changing front nine!
